WorkItem.ClosedComment: These work list items are all checked into Release, and are live on the site.
WorkItem.Description: Currently their sorting makes little sense; hence this is an issue/bug rather than a feature. Options considered include alphabitical sort, keep the order on the scoreboard (including reorder), or sorting by overall score. The latter seems to make the most sense.
WorkItem.Summary: Sort summary report sites by overall score
